update members set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telnumber = #{telnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, licensenumber = #{licensenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
